about.title: About me
description: Graduated from EPITA, a French engineering school in Paris, I was exposed to the Computer Science world throughout my studies and internships.
With a strong interest in the web development, especially on the websites visual design and user experience, I committed myself to put my early career as a Front-End Engineer.

I moved to the United States after my graduation where I started working in the Bay Area as a Front-End engineer for Heartflow, a medical software company which helps doctors to diagnose coronary artery disease for patients.

events.job: Front-End engineer working on Heartflowâ€™s medical platforms and tools to detect Coronary Artery diseases.
Freelance Front-End engineer focused on the development of the new Innso Knowledge Base application.
Graduated from a Masterâ€™s Degree in Computer Science specialization Web and Mobile development.
Internship focused on the development from scratch of a newly mobile app to follow live events programs for poker players present upon the Winamax Tournaments.
Internship centered around full stack technologies with new tools and features implementations for the Clubvivre customer and internal platforms.

skills.title: My skills
description: I enjoy building hand-crafted websites with a touch of personal aesthetic although my design creativity can be limited. However, I have developed through my past experiences, skills in translating web and mobile graphical layout into a structured HTML / CSS web page without compromising browsers supports.

Familiar with modern web technologies, I like building web applications with well-supported and innovate client libraries like Vue.js which is currently my favorite one. Though I still believe in understanding the cores and principles of Vanilla.js are the keys to bring your app to the next level to provide performance and friendly experience to the user.
Last but not least, I have a little experience using server-side technologies like Node.js as well as knowledges in tools such as Docker or setup of web server as Nginx.
In the quest of seeking new challenges, I keep myself updated with the latest trends and upcoming news in relation to the World Wide Web
